title: How to Make an Origami Angry Bird (Bookmark)

steps.headline: Get a square piece of paper.
steps.description: It is recommended that you use yellow paper with a blank back.

steps.headline: Fold the upper left corner to the lower right corner, blank side down.
Fold the left and right corners to the bottom.
Fold the two flaps at the bottom up to the top.
Fold the flap at the top right hand corner to where the crease ends.
Fold the top right corner to the crease that fold #1 made.
Repeat on the left hand side.
Fold the bottom up to about a two thirds of the way up and fold the paper behind it back.
Fold the remaining sliver of paper at the bottom up (you can make it white if you want).
Fold the triangle of paper down to form the beak.
Color this and the eyebrows orange.
Cut out a piece of black (uneven) paper and glue it on for the hair (feather-top).
Fold the yellow angry bird again, but use red paper instead.
Add googly eyes or draw them on.
Cut the edges off and round the top.
Cut a piece of red paper and glue it on for the hair.
Done.
steps.description: You now have the red Angry Bird!

text: Yellow Angry Bird Get a square piece of paper. It is recommended that you use yellow paper with a blank back. Fold the upper left corner to the lower right corner, blank side down.  Fold the left and right corners to the bottom.  Fold the two flaps at the bottom up to the top.  Fold the flap at the top right hand corner to where the crease ends.  Unfold.  Fold the top right corner to the crease that fold #1 made.  Repeat on the left hand side.  Fold the bottom up to about a two thirds of the way up and fold the paper behind it back.  Fold the remaining sliver of paper at the bottom up (you can make it white if you want).  Fold the triangle of paper down to form the beak.  Color this and the eyebrows orange. Add eyes. Cut out a piece of black (uneven) paper and glue it on for the hair (feather-top). Done! Red Angry Bird Fold the yellow angry bird again, but use red paper instead.  Color the eyebrows black.  Add googly eyes or draw them on.  Cut the edges off and round the top.  Cut a piece of red paper and glue it on for the hair.  Done. You now have the red Angry Bird!
sentences: Yellow Angry Bird Get a square piece of paper.
It is recommended that you use yellow paper with a blank back.
Fold the upper left corner to the lower right corner, blank side down.
Fold the left and right corners to the bottom.
Fold the two flaps at the bottom up to the top.
Fold the flap at the top right hand corner to where the crease ends.
Unfold.
Fold the top right corner to the crease that fold #1 made.
Repeat on the left hand side.
Fold the bottom up to about a two thirds of the way up and fold the paper behind it back.
Fold the remaining sliver of paper at the bottom up (you can make it white if you want).
Fold the triangle of paper down to form the beak.
Color this and the eyebrows orange.
Add eyes.
Cut out a piece of black (uneven) paper and glue it on for the hair (feather-top).
Done!
Red Angry Bird Fold the yellow angry bird again, but use red paper instead.
Color the eyebrows black.
Add googly eyes or draw them on.
Cut the edges off and round the top.
Cut a piece of red paper and glue it on for the hair.
Done.
You now have the red Angry Bird!
